For the following questions, try to recall the amount of physical activity and time spent doing each activity during a normal day.
I. Household Activities

properties.name: servantHh
properties.label: Do you have servant(s) who help with household activities?

properties.name: servantParttime
properties.label: Number of part-time (not live-in) servants
properties.help: A part time servant is one who does all or part of household work at employer’s house but does not live in his / her house or is working at employer’s house for less than 8 hours. Household work may involve caring of children, cleaning, cooking, ironing, food shopping, sweeping, dusting, mopping, washing clothes.

properties.name: servantFulltime
properties.label: Number of full-time servants
properties.help: A full time servant is one who lives in employer’s household for 21 days in a month or more or who is working in employers house for 8 hours or more in a day

properties.label: How much time do you spend on doing the following activities in the last 24 hours

properties.name: hhMaintanence
properties.label: Household maintenance(sweeping, dusting, mopping etc) (mins)

properties.name: cooking
properties.label: Cooking (mins)

properties.name: walking
properties.label: Walking (to buy things/running errands/ to and from employment/school) (mins)
properties.help: To buy things/ running errands/ to and from employment/school. Walking for exercise purpose should not be included under this heading.

properties.name: cycling
properties.label: Cycling (to buy things/running errands/to and from employment/school) (mins)
properties.help: To buy things/ running errands/ to and from employment/school. Cycling for exercise purpose should not be included in this section

properties.name: takingcare
properties.label: Taking care (actively) of children/ grandchildren (mins)
properties.help: Taking care of children (aged 10 years or below): Include active involvement with the kid, any activity which requires physical movement.

properties.name: carryingwater
properties.label: Carrying water (mins)
properties.help: When water source is not inside the house (tap) then the respondent may have to carry water from well/ hand pump, or a common tap for the group of people.

properties.name: othersActivity
properties.label: Are you spending your time on any other activity?

properties.name: othersSpecify
properties.label: If Others, then please specify

properties.name: othersActivityTime
properties.label: If others, please specify time spent on that activity (mins)
II. Rest/Entertainment

properties.name: totalHrsSleep
properties.label: How many hours do you typically sleep per day (incl. naps)?

properties.name: snoreSleep
properties.label: Do you snore during sleep?

properties.name: dayTimeNap
properties.label: Do you usually take a daytime nap?

properties.name: hrsSleepAfterEat
properties.label: How many hours after eating in the evening do you go to sleep?

properties.name: hrsWatchtvDay
properties.label: How many hours per day do you watch TV/movies (hours)
properties.help: Report frequency of duration in hours. Report the activity for only week days(Monday – Friday)

properties.name: hrsWatchtvHoliday
properties.label: How many hours per day do you watch TV/movies on holidays?(hours)
properties.help: Report the activity for only for Sunday, Saturday, National or Public holidays or any other holidays

properties.label: IV. Recreational Activities
properties.help: Recreation activities are those activities which are involved in refreshment of health or spirits by relaxation and enjoyment.

properties.name: exercise
properties.label: During the past 12 months, how often did you do exercise in your leisure time?
If you do sports or exercise now – which sport(s)/exercise?
properties.help: Report every current ( 1 year before the date of interview) sports and exercise activity performed by respondent.

properties.name: sportExs1
properties.label: What is your main type of exercise?

properties.name: durationSportExs1
properties.label: How long have you been doing this exercise? (In years)
properties.help: Report the age at which respondent started exercise

properties.name: noHrsSportExs1Wk
properties.label: About how many hours per week did you do such exercise in leisure time?
properties.help: Report the total duration of exercise per week using frequency in hours

properties.name: sportExs2
properties.label: What is your other main type of exercise, if any?

properties.name: durationSportExs2
properties.label: How long have you been doing this exercise?(In years)
properties.help: Report the age at which respondent started exercise

properties.name: noHrsSportExs2Wk
properties.label: About how many hours per week did you do such exercise in leisure time?
properties.help: Report the total duration of exercise per week using frequency in hours

properties.name: sportsExsPast
properties.label: Have you ever done any sports/ exercise in the past?
properties.help: Report if respondent performed any sports/exercise in the past but not currently performing it.

properties.label: If you do sports or exercise in the past ? which sport(s)/exercise?

properties.name: sportExs1Past
properties.label: Name of the Sport/exercise 1

properties.name: ageStartSportExs1Past
properties.label: At what age did you start doing it? (years)
properties.help: Report the age at which respondent started exercise

properties.name: ageStopSportExs1
properties.label: At what age did you stop doing it? (years)
properties.help: Report the age at which respondent stopped exercising

properties.name: timeSportExs1WkPast
properties.label: How much time in total per week? (hours)
properties.help: Report the total duration of exercise in week using frequency in hours

properties.name: sweatHeartbeatPhyAct
properties.label: In a typical week during the past 12 months, how often did you sweat or have a much faster heartbeat because of heavy physical activities/exercise?

properties.name: weightChangeStatus
properties.label: During the past 12 months, has your weight changed significantly?

properties.name: effortReduceWt
properties.label: Have you tried to reduce weight in the past 12 months?
Please mark how you think you looked like at different ages

properties.label: Now

properties.name: ageTwentyMale
properties.label: At around age 20

properties.name: ageTenMale
properties.label: At around age 10
